Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class AdvancedBuilder

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
project.chenlin_17.Views.AdvancedBuilder
public class AdvancedBuilder extends WorldBuilder
This class is the concrete class extends from the WorldBuilder class.
It sets image game settings instead of geometric settings.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • AdvancedBuilder

      public AdvancedBuilder(SceneOptions sceneOptions)
      This constructor initializes the player's choice for theme. Since all the later buildings will relate to the theme choice. This step is very important.
      Parameters:
      sceneOptions - the player's choice for theme

  • Method Details

    • buildSound

      public void buildSound()
      This function implements the abstract sound builder step in the parent class.
      It builds sound according to theme topic.
      Specified by:
      buildSound in class WorldBuilder
      See Also:
      • WorldBuilder.buildSound()

    • buildWallGroups

      public void buildWallGroups(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle drawArea, int options)
      This function implements the abstract wall builder step in the parent class.
      It sets brick walls for all the levels, not just the level the player choose.
      Specified by:
      buildWallGroups in class WorldBuilder
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the area used for showing bricks
      options - player's choice for theme, not used in this builder type
      See Also:
      • WorldBuilder.buildWall(Rectangle, int)

    • buildBall

      public void buildBall(BallModel model, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      This function implements the abstract ball builder step in the parent class.
      It sets the image ball instead of the Ellipse ball face.
      The ball's speed is also initialized here.
      Specified by:
      buildBall in class WorldBuilder
      Parameters:
      model - ball's model
      color - the player chosen color, not used in this type, since it uses the image ball
      See Also:
      • WorldBuilder.buildBall(BallModel, Color)

    • buildBackground

      public void buildBackground(double height, double width)
      This function implements the abstract background builder step in the parent class.
      It sets the theme-related background image of the game.
      Specified by:
      buildBackground in class WorldBuilder
      Parameters:
      height - background image height
      width - background image width
      See Also:

    • makeScanner

      private Scanner makeScanner(String filePath)
      It is a helper function of making the file scanner.
      Parameters:
      filePath - world file name
      Returns:
      scanner reader of the specific type

    • makeBrickWall

      private ArrayList<Brick> makeBrickWall(String worldFilePath, double width, javafx.scene.Group brickGroup)
      This helper function helps build the bricks for the specific level.
      It is achieved through reading file. The world file defines the brick type and its position.
      Besides, the brick height and width is calculated using the number stored in the file.
      After reading the file, there is a convention for converting those read characters to image.
      Parameters:
      worldFilePath - world file name for the bricks building
      width - width for wall
      brickGroup - brick container for the current level
      Returns:
      bricks for current level

    • getBrick

      private Brick getBrick(Character brickType, javafx.scene.Group brickGroup)
      This function builds the brick view according to the position and type read from the world file.
      It contains three basic types: Cement, Steel and Clay.
      It contains two different size: half and full.
      Parameters:
      brickType - character read from the world file
      brickGroup - brick groups for each level
      Returns:
      built brick with its type and image added

    • getType

      public String getType()
      This function gets the builder's type.
      It is used for character option page.
      Specified by:
      getType in class WorldBuilder
      Returns:
      the builder type

    • setImageBrick

      private void setImageBrick(SceneOptions sceneOptions)
      This helper function helps set all the brick image set according to the chosen theme.
      Parameters:
      sceneOptions - player chosen theme

    • buildPaddle

      public void buildPaddle(PaddleModel model, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, javafx.scene.image.Image image, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle drawArea)
      This function implements the abstract paddle builder step in the parent class.
      It connects the paddle image to the paddle face and sets it above the paddle face.
      Specified by:
      buildPaddle in class WorldBuilder
      Parameters:
      model - the paddle model
      color - the expected paddle color for image paddle
      image - player chosen paddle image
      drawArea - paddle container to define the movement
      See Also:
      • WorldBuilder.buildPaddle(PaddleModel, Color, Image, Rectangle)
